                                        +--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+                                                            
                                        |                                                         network                                                          |                                                            
                                        |    +-----------------------------------------------------------+                                                         |                                                            
                                        |    |                        cell tower                         |                                                         |                                                            
                                        |    |                                                           |                          +-------------------------+    |                                                            
                  +--------make call-------->|                                                           |                          |     data processor      |    |                                                            
                  |                     |    |    +---------------+-------send------->+----------------+ |                          |      +----------+       |----------------+                                                
                  |                     |    |    |               |                   |                | |                          |      | storage  |       |    |           |                                                
                  |                     |    |    |  satellites   |-------send------->|  transmitter   |------------phone logs------------>|          |       |    |           |                                                
                  |                     |    |    |               |                   |                | |                          |      +----------+       |    |           |                                                
                  |                     |    |    |               |-------send------->|                | |                          |                         |    |           |                                                
+-------------+---+                     |    |    +---------------+                   +----------------+ |                          |                         |    |           |                                                
|    user     |---+                     |    |                                                           |                          |                         |    |           |                                                
|             |   |                     |    +-----------------------------------------------------------+                          +-------------------------+    |           |                                                
+-------------+   |                     |                                                                                                                          |           |                                                
                  |                     |     +----------------------+                                                                                             |           |                                                
                  |                     |     |    online portal     |                                                                                             |           |   +---------------+                   +-------+
                  |                     |     |                      |                                                                                             |           +-->|  api server   |------persist----->| logs  |
                  +--------------access-------------->+-----+        |                                                                                             |           +---|               |                   |       |
                                        |     |       | ui  |        |                                                                                             |           |   +---------------+                   +-------+
                                   +----------------->|     |        |                                                                                             |           |                                                
                                   |    |     |       +-----+        |                                                                                             |           |                                                
                                   |    |     |                      |                                                                                             |           |                                                
                                   |    |     +----------------------+                                                                                             |           |
